SKT_FIRST.name: Fair Condemnation
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks 2 enemies, the target and the <color=#28d9ed>enemy with the highest Speed</color>. Has a <color=#28d9ed>60%</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵2体にダメージを与える。敵単体と<color=#28d9ed>最もスピードが速い敵</color>を攻撃する。<color=#28d9ed>60%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>-20%</color>DOWNさせる。\nこのスキルは自分の<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적 2인을 공격합니다. 지정한 대상과 <color=#28d9ed>속도가 가장 빠른 적</color>을 공격합니다. <color=#28d9ed>60%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>-20%</color> 감소시킵니다.\n이 스킬은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>가 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击2名敌人。攻击所选目标和<color=#28d9ed>速度最快的敌人</color>。有<color=#28d9ed>60%</color>的几率使目标的<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>降低<color=#28d9ed>-20%</color>。\n自身<color=#28d9ed>速度</color>越高,则该技能伤害越高。

SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 攻击全体敌人\n伤害提升

SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\n貫通力UP
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 转化为强化技能\n穿透力提升

SKT_SECOND.name: Steely Oath
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
(Passive Effect) Cannot be inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color>, <color=#28d9ed>Frozen</color>, or <color=#28d9ed>Petrified</color>.
(Triggered Effect) Prepares the <color=#28d9ed>Revenge</color> effect for every <color=#28d9ed>cooldown cycle</color> of the skill.
Attacks all enemies when <color=#28d9ed>Revenge</color> is activated.
This skill deals damage proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp:
(パッシブ効果)<color=#28d9ed>スタン</color>、<color=#28d9ed>凍結</color>、<color=#28d9ed>石化</color>の影響を受けない。
(発動効果)スキルターンごとに<color=#28d9ed>【復讐】</color>を発動する。
<color=#28d9ed>【復讐】</color>:敵全体にダメージを与える。
このスキルは自分の<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr:
(패시브 효과) <color=#28d9ed>스턴</color>, <color=#28d9ed>빙결</color>, <color=#28d9ed>석화</color>의 영향을 받지 않습니다.
(발동 효과) 스킬의 <color=#28d9ed>쿨타임</color>마다 <color=#28d9ed>복수</color> 효과를 준비합니다.
<color=#28d9ed>복수</color> 발동 시 적 전체를 공격합니다.
자신의 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>가 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh:
(被动效果)不受<color=#28d9ed>晕眩</color>、<color=#28d9ed>冰冻</color>、<color=#28d9ed>石化</color>效果的影响。
(触发效果)每当技能处于<color=#28d9ed>冷却时间</color>时,<color=#28d9ed>复仇</color>效果待触发。
<color=#28d9ed>复仇</color>效果生效时,攻击全体敌人。
自身<color=#28d9ed>速度</color>越高,则伤害越高。

2_jp: 弱体効果のターン-1ターン
2_zh: 弱化效果持续时间-1回合
5_jp: 弱体効果のターン-1ターン
5_zh: 弱化效果持续时间-1回合

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Unforgivable Sinner
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> chance to steal <color=#28d9ed>all</color> <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> from the target.\nIncreases damage dealt proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>すべて</color>奪う。\nこのスキルは自分の<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>모두</color> 빼앗습니다.\n이 스킬은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>가 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>的几率夺取目标的<color=#28d9ed>所有</color><color=#28d9ed>强化效果</color>。\n自身的<color=#28d9ed>速度</color>越高,则该技能的伤害越高。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers Action Points of the caster and the next Skill Chain caster by <color=#28d9ed>25</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to reduce <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the target by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、自分と次のチェーンスキル参加者のAPを<color=#28d9ed>25</color>獲得する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>-20%</color>DOWNさせる。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 자신과 다음 스킬 체인 수행자의 AP를 <color=#28d9ed>25</color> 회복합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>80%</color>의 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>-20%</color> 감소시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携技能自由顺序效果</color>:攻击后,使自身和下一个连携技能施展者的AP恢复<color=#28d9ed>25</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>的几率使目标的<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>降低<color=#28d9ed>-20%</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
